concept.title: ICU Layout Engine Component
concept.shortdesc: The ICU Layout Engine component is a plug-in to the Font Store that wraps the ICU (International Components for Unicode) layout engine. This performs contextual shaping for specific scripts that require this feature.

conbody.p: The CBR package name for the ICU Layout Engine component is graphics_iculayoutengine.

link.linktext: Font and Text Services Collection Overview
